backend/main.mo: Main actor defining admin auth, media storage mixins, and data types for vehicles, promotions, testimonials, blogs, contacts, and stats.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old media assets to new format with legacyDataUrl and externalBlob fields.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report with no listed features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries of various frontend components and pages.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS config defining color variables and base styles for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app and setting page metadata.
frontend/REDEPLOYMENT.md: Guide describing steps to rebuild, redeploy, and validate frontend canister routes and media manager authorization.
frontend/src/admin/AdminGuard.tsx: Admin guard component enforcing admin authentication with optional emergency bypass mode.
frontend/src/admin/AdminLayout.tsx: Admin layout component with collapsible sidebar, navigation links, and logout handling.
frontend/src/admin/auth/adminSession.ts: Manages admin session storage with localStorage and cookies, including legacy migration and bypass support.
Enables a temporary admin authentication bypass with predefined Super Admin data.
frontend/src/admin/components/AccessDeni: Displays an access denied message with a button redirecting to the admin login page.
frontend/src/admin/components/AdminPageH: Renders a page header with title, optional subtitle, and optional action area.
frontend/src/admin/components/BlogFormDi: Dialog for creating and editing blog posts, including image selection and comment management.
frontend/src/admin/components/ConfirmDel: Reusable confirmation dialog for delete actions with customizable text and loading state.
Generic CRUD table with search, custom column renderers, status badges, and edit/delete actions.
frontend/src/admin/components/media/Home: Manages homepage slider banner images with add, remove, reorder, and library selection features.
frontend/src/admin/components/media/Medi: Media library panel allowing search, preview, and deletion of uploaded media assets.
Dialog for browsing and selecting media assets with search, filtering, and error handling.
Button component for uploading media files, converting them to data URLs, and creating media records.
frontend/src/admin/components/PromotionF: Dialog for creating and editing promotions with fields for details, dates, images, and publish state.
frontend/src/admin/components/Testimonia: Form dialog for creating or editing testimonials with fields for text, rating, image selection, and publish status.
frontend/src/admin/components/VehicleFor: Comprehensive vehicle editor dialog supporting basic info, media, variants, technical specs, commercial features, and publish controls.
frontend/src/admin/components/vehicles/C: UI component rendering checkboxes for commercial vehicle feature toggles and updating parent state.
frontend/src/admin/components/vehicles/T: Form component for editing technical spec fields and managing a list of additional features.
frontend/src/admin/components/vehicles/V: Manages creation, editing, and deletion of vehicle variants with features and pricing adjustments.
frontend/src/admin/hooks/useAdminCmsQuer: Collection of React Query hooks for CRUD operations on CMS entities using authenticated admin actor calls.
frontend/src/admin/hooks/useAdminLoginDe: Deprecated placeholder export kept only to avoid breaking imports.
frontend/src/admin/hooks/useAdminSession: Hook managing admin session state, validation, login, and emergency bypass logic.
frontend/src/admin/pages/AdminLoginDebug: Debug page to test admin login via UI, displaying results and error states.
Admin login form that handles authentication, redirects on success, and includes an emergency bypass mode and validation states.
frontend/src/admin/pages/AdminProfilePag: Admin profile editing page that loads the user profile, allows updates, and saves changes via CMS API hooks.
frontend/src/admin/pages/BlogAdminPage.t: Blog management interface providing CRUD operations, search filtering, and dialogs for creating, editing, and deleting posts.
frontend/src/admin/pages/DashboardPage.t: CMS dashboard showing summary counts of vehicles, promotions, testimonials, blog posts, contacts, and credit simulations.
Management page for contact form submissions and credit simulations with search, tabbed views, and delete actions.
frontend/src/admin/pages/MediaManagerPag: Media management page enabling upload, deletion, and selection of media assets, including banner configuration and library browsing.
frontend/src/admin/pages/PromotionsAdmin: Admin page that lists, searches, creates, edits, and deletes promotions using dialogs and CRUD hooks.
frontend/src/admin/pages/TestimonialsAdm: Admin interface for viewing, filtering, adding, editing, and deleting testimonials through CRUD operations.
frontend/src/admin/pages/VehiclesAdminPa: Admin page for managing vehicles with category filtering, search, and full CRUD form and delete workflows.
frontend/src/admin/pages/VisitorStatsAdm: Displays extended visitor statistics in card format with loading/error states and auto-refresh behavior.
frontend/src/admin/styles/adminTheme.css: CSS theme defining layout, sidebar, cards, tables, and button styles for the admin UI.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root routing configuration for all public and admin pages using TanStack Router and shared layouts.
frontend/src/components/blog/BlogComment: Comment form component with validation, reset behavior, and support for reply mode.
Renders nested blog comments with reply handling and dynamic reply forms.
frontend/src/components/blog/BlogInterac: Displays like, share, and comment actions with local like tracking and tooltips.
frontend/src/components/forms/ContactFor: Contact form that validates required fields, submits via mutation hook, and resets on success.
frontend/src/components/forms/CreditSimu: Form for submitting credit simulation requests with validation and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/GlobalErrorBound: React error boundary that captures uncaught errors and shows a refresh prompt fallback UI.
frontend/src/components/home/HomeMainBan: Auto-rotating banner slider with animation control and fallbacks for single or no images.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Renders the site footer with contact info, social links, and visitor stats.
frontend/src/components/layout/PublicLay: Wraps public pages with navbar, optional hero, CTA sections, and footer.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Botto: Provides a mobile bottom action bar with call, WhatsApp, credit simulation, and menu options.
frontend/src/components/navigation/MainM: Displays a bottom sheet navigation menu listing main site routes.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Navba: Renders the top navigation bar with links, WhatsApp button, and mobile menu drawer.
frontend/src/components/public/SectionTi: Reusable section title component with icon and styled heading.
frontend/src/components/sections/BottomC: Call‑to‑action section prompting users to contact via WhatsApp.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Shows a branded hero header with welcome text and tagline.
frontend/src/components/vehicles/Vehicle: Displays a vehicle's image, details, price, features, and links to detail or consultation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity login, state management, and AuthClient setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data such as vehicles, blogs, promotions, and interactions.
frontend/src/hooks/useVisitorTracking.ts: Tracks unique visitors, page views, and periodic presence updates using mutations tied to actor availability.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles with custom CSS variables, themes, and animations for banners and layout adjustments.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/BlogDetailPage.tsx: Renders a blog article page with likes, shares, comments, and related data fetched via hooks.
frontend/src/pages/BlogListPage.tsx: Displays a grid of blog posts with loading state and links to individual blog detail pages.
frontend/src/pages/CommercialVehicleDeta: Displays detailed info for a selected commercial vehicle, including variants, pricing, features, and contact actions.
frontend/src/pages/CommercialVehiclesPag: Lists all published commercial vehicles and groups them into light-duty, medium-duty, and tractor head categories.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Shows a contact form along with dealer contact details, map location, and sales consultant information.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page featuring banner sliders, highlighted vehicles, about section, CTA banner, and latest blog posts.
frontend/src/pages/PassengerVehicleDetai: Displays detailed info for a selected passenger vehicle with variants, pricing, and contact options.
frontend/src/pages/PassengerVehiclesPage: Lists all published passenger vehicles in a grid with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/PromoPage.tsx: Shows active promotions with images, descriptions, validity dates, and terms.
frontend/src/pages/TestimonialsPage.tsx: Displays customer testimonials with ratings, photos, and reviews.
frontend/src/redeploy/routeSmoke.ts: Defines route definitions and lists of public/admin routes for manual smoke testing, plus utilities to generate checklists and validate router path coverage.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL and hash parameters, storing them in sessionStorage, and managing persisted or cleared parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, themes, animations, and plugins like typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, architecture rules, known issues, and constraints for the automotive site’s backend/frontend and admin CMS.
